org.slim3.datastore.json
Annotation Type Json

public @interface Json

The Json annotation.

Since:
1.0.6
Author:
Takao Nakaguchi

Optional Element Summary
 String alias
          The alias name of the attribute in JSON.
 Class<? extends JsonCoder> coder
          The encoder class which is responsible for encoding and decoding JSON.
 boolean ignore
          Determines whether the attribute is ignored when encoding and decoding JSON.
 boolean ignoreNull
          Determines whether the null attribute is ignored when encoding to JSON.
 

ignore

public abstract boolean ignore
Determines whether the attribute is ignored when encoding and decoding JSON.

Returns:
true if the attribute is ignored
Default:
false

ignoreNull

public abstract boolean ignoreNull
Determines whether the null attribute is ignored when encoding to JSON.

Returns:
true if the null attribute is ignored
Default:
true

alias

public abstract String alias
The alias name of the attribute in JSON.

Returns:
the alias name
Default:
""

coder

public abstract Class<? extends JsonCoder> coder
The encoder class which is responsible for encoding and decoding JSON.

Returns:
the coder class
Default:
org.slim3.datastore.json.Default.class
